item.title: Whats wrong with this?
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

Hey,

I wanted to make a starter, and i added this: if(NPCID == 355){ if (combatLevel >= 3 && combatLevel <= 50) { addItem(995, 20000000); starterGive = 1; } if (combatLevel >= 51 && combatLevel <= 100) { addItem(995, misc.random(10000000)); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(878, 5); addItem(140, misc.random(8)); starterGive = 1; } if (combatLevel >= 101 && combatLevel <= 120) { addItem(995, misc.random(15000000)); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(878, 8); addItem(140, misc.random(8)); addItem(4740, misc.random(82)); addItem(3140, 1); addItem(4716, 1); starterGive = 1; } if (combatLevel >= 121 && combatLevel <= 125) { addItem(995, misc.random(25000000)); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(878, 5); addItem(140, misc.random(8)); addItem(4740, misc.random(82)); addItem(3140, 1); addItem(4718, 1); addItem(4716, 1); addItem(4708, 1); starterGive = 1; } if (combatLevel == 126) { addItem(995, misc.random(25000000)); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(878, 5); addItem(140, misc.random(8)); addItem(4740, misc.random(82)); addItem(3140, 1); addItem(4718, 1); addItem(4716, 1); addItem(4708, 1); addItem(4734, 1); addItem(4736, 1); addItem(4740, misc.random(184)); addItem(565, misc.random(244)); addItem(560, misc.random(244)); addItem(555, misc.random(555)); starterGive = 1; } }

I compile nothing wrong,
But it doesnt give the items.

,Thanks

Read full topic
